text: Is there something i can do to make CTA´s load faster? They sometimes appear after the site has already loaded which sometimes look  a little bit odd :wink:
That’s because they use JS. nothing you can really do except optimize your whole site’s speed
thanks
if I have 2 modules and they both require the same stylesheet, the cms is calling the same stylesheet twice. Is that supposed to happen?
what method are you using to load the stylesheet, a require_css or as a linked asset? or are you injecting a link element
linked asset
then it should NOT be doing that.
<@U6TBZ66FN>
<@U3T21PDBK> is it possible any other modules are referencing that file?
I think that is by design. <@UGWB0PCCV>
its a module on a page. The page has linked asset x and the module has linked asset x
We could avoid the duplicate CSS. Let me discuss with our team.
I always thought it would only load once already :thinking_face:
Hi, anyone know I can get a partner account?
<https://www.HubSpot.com/partners>
i assume you mean marketing agency partner so it’s the middle cta near the top of this page
i know that the standard SSL that comes with HubSpot can be upgraded from TLS 1.0 to TLS 1.1 upon request… and I think they can do TLS 1.2 upon request but can anybody verify?
Hi <@U24GZQ3GF> thank you, but I mean partner to subscribe leads on pages
yup, you can request to have the lower versions disabled for the portal through the support team
awesome thanks!

Has anyone achieved any sort of "member portal" where registered users have the ability to login to their unique account to update their own "profile page" with HubSpot? If not are there any sort of integrations?
this can be done with the enterprise edition if i am correct
Yup, it’s a standard feature of the Enterprise version of the Marketing Hub
<https://www.HubSpot.com/product-updates/create-membership-content-using-marketing-hub>
be cool if the dev portal we get could have these features so we can kick the tires a bit
You actually do have it in any test portal spun up from your dev portal. They are full Enterprise growth suite.   If you go to settings, you will see “Private Content” on the left hand nav
ah sweet!  thanks!
no bueno...i dont seem to have this
want to DM me your HubId and I can see what’s up?
Is there any live examples or previews of what it looks like for the member/person who would actually log in?
Are they directed to a template that I would build or to the HubSpot ap?
Zack I'd also love to "demo this"

Awesome, best way to do this is to go over to <http://developers.HubSpot.com|developers.HubSpot.com> and sign up for a developer account from which you can spin up to 10 test accounts that are of the Enterprise Everything flavor

There are redirect options you can set for where the user should be directed to after they login. By default, if a user navigates to a restricted page, they are asked to login and redirected back to the page after a successful login.
Hi all, this is chathura from sri lanka, im new to HubSpot and this group. Hope this group will help to build up my knowledge on HubSpot.

Am I missing something obvious here, but running into another ADA issue. Have 5 videos on a HubSpot page that are all being loaded over the default Vidyard integration. But all thumbnail images are missing alt text and I can't seem to find a way to add it when editing the video. I assumed it was through the Meta tags input box when editing the video, but that didn't seem to do anything.
Any thoughts everyone?
